summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingCOSRX's Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch visibly hydrates, plumps and brightens the delicate eye area. The eye mask consists of two sizes - small and large to soothe and hydrate the skin with a perfect fit!
details: DetailsBenefitsPlump & Hydrate the delicate eye areaDepuff and nourishUnique, two size patches for the perfect fitThe Honey Comb texture ensure the patch stays in place! Perfect for makeup prepKey IngredientsSnail Secretion FiltrateIncludesEye Patches (60 ct)TweezersItem 2616456How To UseApply the hydrogel patches to the desired area using the tweezers contained inside. Remove after 20 - 30 minutes.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, 1,2-hexanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (carob) Gum, Betaine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Chlorphenesin, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (guar) Gum, Calcium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose, Cellulose Gum, Adenosine, Potassium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, PEG-90m.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply the hydrogel patches to the desired area using the tweezers contained inside. Remove after 20 - 30 minutes.

reviews.headline: Skin irritation every time
reviews.comments:
This product doesn't work for me. I've got a visible skin irritation every time I tried it. I would recommend testing it first. I don't get breakouts easily, and this feels more like a dermatological reaction.
There is not much else to say. I have not observed any improvements to the puffiness under eyes.

reviews.headline: Best ever eye patches
reviews.comments:
These are the best to reduce puffiness, super hydrate and brightening the under eye area! These work every time!!!! 
I would purchase these over any and all that are out on the marget! These are literally the best ever! And this is coming a professional who does skin for a living‚Ä¶ just get them, they actually work! 
I wish ulta would carry these in store! ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: These are the best eye pads
reviews.comments:
These are truly the best eye pads!
As a licensed Aesthetician‚Ä¶
 I highly recommend these!
Reduce all puffiness under eyes! Work every time! Unscented! 
I place these on my under eye area after I am finished with my makeup. Once I remove these eye pads, my under eye area look well rested, hydrated, 
and bright! 
No need to apply concealer or retouch any of my makeup! I also love the different size eye pads.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again-love the different sizes
reviews.comments: I am a fan of COSRX"s other products and these are no different....they do a nice job of hydrating under my eyes.  The extra large patches are great before a big night out

reviews.headline: Nice, but wasteful
reviews.comments:
The product is nice and is a fun step to add to my morning routine. The design, as other reviews mention, is just very odd. The container includes "half" large sized eye patches and the rest are very small, almost unusable. I know tht i will most likely be throwing away product once i finish using up the larger sizes, unfortunately. It would have been very simple for them to cut the sizes in half when they were creating them.

I have sensitive skin, and it doesn't mind the eye patches.

reviews.headline: Product great, design not so much
reviews.comments: The product itself is great and does work but the fact it's got huge Patch size and super tiny ones. It becomes a huge waste regardless. If you're simply using as an eyepatch. So frustrating.

reviews.headline: The best patches I've ever used. Yet, too slimy.
reviews.comments: I will forever give these patches a 5 star because they work & the cooling effect is amazing. The only downside is the fact they are way too slimy. Once applied, you have to remain stoned face or else the patches will slide down. No talking, drinking or moving. Otheriwse, my favorite.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This product started burning after a couple minutes and left my skin red. I wouldnt use if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Best eye patches
reviews.comments: I have eczema and super dry skin thus is such an affordable option feels very mucb high end love the way it leave my skin so hydrated and healthy looking

reviews.headline: Bad Design
reviews.comments: The serum is lovely but the design and cut of the patches is horrible. I don't understand how to position the patches to fit the undereye.

reviews.headline: Finally patches that work
reviews.comments: I've tried so many under eye patches for hydration, getting rid of darkness and puffiness after sleepless nights. These patches are the only ones I've ever seen a difference with! Its a bonus they don't slide down your face while trying to get ready.

reviews.headline: Love these eye patches!!
reviews.comments: I use these under eye patches while im doing my eye makeup to catch fall out and provide hydration! They are lovely and make my under eyes and cheeks so smooth!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: The first time i used it I noticed a difference with my skin. Highly recommend to use this product for softer skin.

reviews.headline: LOVE these eye gels!
reviews.comments: I loved these eye patches so much! They didn't slide down off my eyes which is a common complaint I have with most brands. These stayed put and were super cooling and hydrating. I will definitely be repurchasing again!

reviews.headline: Great for dry under eye
reviews.comments: Lately my under eye have been really dry and causing any makeup to crease and look terrible. Inhave fine lines at 40 but they are minimal. But when my under eye area is dry,  oh man. I look aged by an additional 5 yrs. These do the trick. I dont have puffy undereyes or discoloration. These work wonderfully for dry undereyes. I put them on for 20, do my hair or other things take them off, apply eye cream and make up ends up looking flawless.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating and helps with depuffing!
reviews.comments: I put the little ones on my undereyes after a sleepless night and they made me look like my normal self! Not miracle workers because I still had my normal amount of bags and darkness but they helped to make me look like I had a normal amount of sleep instead of a few crappy hours of sleep

reviews.headline: My favorite eye mask
reviews.comments: I get compliments about how beautiful my skin looks, it gives you this glow but a natural soft glow under the eyes. I would recommend it & pair it with the eye cream & cheff kissü§åüèΩ

reviews.headline: Way too slippery, didn't stay on my face
reviews.comments: The first time I used these I made sure my face was completely dry. I put them on and they slid down my face a lot. They were way too big for my eye area, especially the top part.

faceoff_positive.comments: I am a frequent user of Cosrx so I had seen the Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch product on the site multiple times before I finally opted to purchase it. I am sure glad that I gave in and gave it a try! The size of the product is much more generous than I was originally expecting. I actually didn't know what to expect at first, so let me explain. I received a jar of "patches" that could be used anywhere on my face, but the idea is that they should be particularly focused on my eye area. You not only get eye patches, but where the eye patches are 'cut' out, you also get the additional part of the "patch", I guess what could be considered waste. But instead of just tossing it, they package it in the product jar and encourage you to place the smaller patches on your smile lines or any other areas that need hydration. It's such a great idea and honestly really effective! For someone who is a school teacher, runs around with very little time for themselves, the 20-30 mins I used to apply these to my face and continue to do other tasks was WELL WORTH IT!
